plot: Ann visits the Peyton mansion and demands an explanation. Hannah tells her she hated them when they were born and wanted Brian out of her life. She admits Brian had an affair with Catherine...
title: "Peyton Place" Episode #2.139
plot_es: Ann visits the Peyton mansion and demands an explanation. Hannah tells her she hated them when they were born and wanted Brian out of her life. She admits Brian had an affair with Catherine...
